**WARNING!**
If you encountered game crash please be 100% sure it is coming from this mod and you can reproduce it EVERY SINGLE RUN before reporting!

**What happened?**
Tell us what happened.

**How to reproduce?**
1. Babalbal
2. ABlabalbla
3. Bladsj

_(please modify the example above.)_
